target


macros for creating library / executable targets


ame_add_custom_commands

macro(ame_add_custom_commands p_targetName)
type: Cmake macro
description: add custom commands to target (from target_PRE_BUILD_COMMANDS)

ame_add_executable

macro(ame_add_executable p_executableName)
type: Cmake macro
description: add an executable target

ame_add_library

macro(ame_add_library p_libraryName)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a library target
- source group files
- get addiontional sources
- check target dependencies
- write include dirs & link dirs
- handle target link libraries

ame_add_utest

macro(ame_add_utest p_testName)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a unit test library

ame_build_static_module_cxx_flags

macro(ame_build_static_module_cxx_flags p_target p_staticModules)
type: Cmake macro
description: build static modules CXX flags for target

ame_check_all_dependencies

macro(ame_check_all_dependencies p_target p_searchTarget)
type: Cmake macro
description: retrieve all dependencies of target

ame_create_exe_target_variables

macro(ame_create_exe_target_variables p_targetName)
type: Cmake macro
description: create all target related variables for an executable
p_targetName: name of target
name_INCLUDE_DIRS
name__IS_HEADER_LIBRARY
name_IS_LIBRARY
name_IS_MODULE
name_DEPENDENCIES
name_EXTERN_DEPENDENCIES
name_COMPANION_ELEMENTS
name_CUSTOM_COMMANDS

ame_create_library_target_variables

macro(ame_create_library_target_variables p_targetName)
type: Cmake macro
description: create all target related variables for a library
p_targetName: name of target
creates following vars
name_INCLUDE_DIRS
name_IS_LIBRARY
name_IS_MODULE
name_DEPENDENCIES
name_EXTERN_DEPENDENCIES
name_COMPANION_ELEMENTS
name_CUSTOM_COMMANDS

ame_enable_LTCG

macro(ame_enable_LTCG p_targetName)
type: Cmake macro
description: enable LTCG for target (msvc only)

ame_find_static_module_dependencies

macro(ame_find_static_module_dependencies p_target p_module)
type: Cmake macro
description: finds static modules dependencies of a target

ame_include_target_dependencies_dirs

macro(ame_include_target_dependencies_dirs p_target)
type: Cmake macro
description: adds target dependencies include paths to target INCLUDE_DIRS / LINK_DIRS

ame_list_contains

macro(ame_list_contains var value)
type: Cmake macro
description: set var to TRUE if list contains value

ame_set_target_module

macro(ame_set_target_module p_targetName p_value)
type: Cmake macro
description: assign module to target
Home cmake source group target utils ftest math core image util documentation

Another Memory Ends - Reference
